targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ipsla_jitter" WHERE ("hostname" = 'uk-lon01c-rg01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("ratio")  *100 AS "Ratio" FROM "ipsla_loss" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "tag_name" fill(null)
